name: Banjara Development Society
briefDescription: Initiated project to protect Chenchu tribe from chronic malnourishment, communicable diseases and      forced     relocation by forest department. Provided training to Chenchu youth and women on sustainable methods of      extraction and collection of minor forest produce, promoted kitchen gardening, income generation activities,      treated      Chenchus for common ailments and also shifted critically ill to the specialty hospitals. Empowered the      Chenchu      community on all the relevant issues and also sensitized officials of line departments for effective      implementation of       welfare and development programmes.
